amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Village situated in more than one county; legal notices; publication.
amendatorysection.para: All notices and other publications, required by law to be published in any county in which any part of an incorporated village is situated, may be published in any newspaper published in such village, and such publication shall have the same force and effect as it would have if published in every county in which any part of such village is situated.
